But that's not offered separately, more like a behind the scenes servicing stack
install ...AND there is no mention of 250MB needed in WinRE ------ Original
Message ------ From "Abbodii" To "" Date
1/23/2024 6:23:22 PM Subject Re: [patchmanagement] Win11 22h2 and later - they
don't need 250 free? Yes? No? and what about checking if you are patched? (aka
I'm confused)
